name: ri
description:
by
  bequa la froth

merveilles hyperjam
first weekend of april 2020

for classic macintosh

you have to set your monitor to
'black & white' in the control panels
or it will be slow

controls:
    arrows or wasd or zqsd to move
    esc or cmd+q to quit

programmed in C
compiled in Retro68
graphics created with Blender and Glimpse

the source code is included in this diskette
